name: Maraschino Cherry Chocolate Cookies
author: ilkaisha
summary: Chocolate, coconut, and maraschino cherries make a perfect combination in this festive cookie recipe. Enjoy these still warm with a nice big glass of milk.
ingredients: ¾ cup drained, dried, and chopped maraschino cherries
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line baking sheets with parchment paper
Beat shortening, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy and fluffy
Add eggs and vanilla extract; stir until well incorporated
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in another bowl; add to sugar mixture, blending until an even dough forms
Add oats, coconut, cherries, and chocolate chips until just mixed in
Scoop rounded tablespoons of dough onto the prepared baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are brown, 8 to 10 minutes
Let rest for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool
